original_title: 媚薬で翌朝まで覚醒絶頂－ キメセク相部屋NTR姦 「憎いほど大嫌いで別れたのに…」
overview: Karen reunites with an ex-boyfriend, who now is a colleague.  She is the same asshole and she is in a love/hate relationship with him, but he also drives her crazy in bed.
title: Magic Chems For A Pleasurable Awakening That Lasts Till Morning. Blissful Sex For Room Sharing NTR Cheating Scenario, Getting Taken Advantage Of. "You're So Terrible I Had To Break Up With You, But..." Karen Kaede
